announcements.announcement:
This release provides fixes for the following bugs:
- Fixed problems with file uploads and the $_POST array handling. - Resolved multiple problems with the FastCGI sapi. - Fixed possible crash in highlight_string(). - Fixed cloning of DOM Documents and Noded. - Several fixes to PDO ODBC driver.
For a full list of changes in PHP 5.1.4, see the [ChangeLog](/ChangeLog-5.php#5.1.4).
